name: 李·德富雷斯特
bio_short: 美国发明家，自称为“广播之父”。他最重要的发明是1907年的“Audion”（三极真空管），这是“第一个”电子放大器，开启了“电子时代”，并使无线电广播、长途电话和早期计算机成为可能。
bio_short_en: An American inventor who styled himself the 'Father of Radio'. His most important invention was the 1907 'Audion' (triode vacuum tube), the *first* electronic amplifier, which started the 'Electronic Age' and made radio, long-distance telephony, and early computers possible.
